issue.title: Not all of the solar array reflects lidar

content.raw: Yes, my code maps black as distant, and white as close.  So the black gap is suspicious.  Note that it would also be reasonable to believe that my code is flawed; if there is no obvious difference in the reflectivity setting of the side panel, I would not invest more time in this.
content.html: Yes, my code maps black as distant, and white as close. So the black gap is suspicious. Note that it would also be reasonable to believe that my code is flawed; if there is no obvious difference in the reflectivity setting of the side panel, I would not invest more time in this.
